name: FULLWAVE
body:
# Recent publications

There is a growing bibliography around FWI.  Imperial & Consortium-member publications on this topic:

**2010**

* [A Strategy for Waveform Inversion without an Accurate Starting Model, Shah et al., EAGE 2010](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P383.pdf?raw=true)

**2011**

* [Full Waveform Inversion: a North Sea OBC case study, Ratcliffe et al., SEG 2011](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/1%2E3627688.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-wavefield Seismic Tomography of Vibrator Data on Land, Al-Yaqoobi et al., EAGE 2011.](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P024.pdf?raw=true)

**2012**

* [Which physics for full-wavefield seismic inversion? Warner et al., EAGE 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE_physics.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform seismic inversion at reservoir depths, Nangoo et al., EAGE 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE-Tommeliten.pdf?raw=true)
* [A Phase-unwrapped Solution for Overcoming a Poor Starting Model in Full-wavefield Inversion, Shah et al., EAGE 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/P014.pdf ?raw=true)
* [Quality assured full-waveform inversion: Ensuring starting model adequacy, SEG 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/phase.pdf?raw=true)
* [Elastic 3D full-waveform inversion, SEG, 2012](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/elastic2.pdf?raw=true)

**2013**

* [Anisotropic 3D full-waveform inversion, Geophysics, 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/geo2012-0338.pdf?raw=true)
* [Next-Generation Seismic Experiments: Wide-Angle, Multi-Azimuth, 3D, Full-Waveform Inversion, Morgan et al., Geophysical Journal International, 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/GJI-2013.pdf?raw=true)
* [Full-waveform inversion of cycle-skipped seismic data by frequency down-shifting, SEG 2013](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/down_shift.pdf?raw=true)

**2014**

**2015**

**2016**

* [Constrained Waveform Inversion - Automatic Salt Flooding with Inclusions, Guasch et al., EAGE 2016](https://github.com/fullwave3d/publications/blob/master/EAGE2016-Salt-Lluis.pdf?raw=true)


[Return to Home Page](http://fullwave3d.github.io/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
